AboutSection.title: Don't miss a single experience
AboutSection.pickup_text: Pick up your car wherever suits you best: right in front of your hotel, apartment or the address you specify. Set off to explore freely from the very first moment.
AboutSection.transfer_text: If you'd like to use a transfer service, simply indicate it on our quote request form and we'll make sure everything goes smoothly.

transfer_quote.label: Request transfer quote
transfer_quote.text: Hi! I'd like a quote for a transfer service.

car_availability.label: Car availability
car_availability.text: Hi! I’d like to ask about car availability for the given date.

interested_in.label: I’m interested
interested_in.text: Hi! I’d like to ask about the car rental process.
